barista_admin_record.SQL_SELECT: SELECT fut_tmm01.firm_id, fut_tmm01.customer_nbr, fut_tmm01.tm_number, fut_arm02.cust_type, fut_tmm01.cont_firm, fut_tmm01.address_1, fut_tmm01.address_2, fut_tmm01.address_3, fut_tmm01.address_4, fut_tmm01.city, fut_tmm01.state, fut_tmm01.zip_code, fut_tmm01.fax_num, fut_tmm01.country_code, fut_tmm01.goals_flag, fut_tmm03.contact_name, fut_tmm03.position, fut_tmm03.primary_contact, fut_tmm03.send_lit, fut_tmm03.announcements, fut_tmm03.use_firm_addr, fut_tmm03.address_1 AS cntct_address_1, fut_tmm03.address_2 AS cntct_address_2, fut_tmm03.city AS cntct_city, fut_tmm03.state_code, fut_tmm03.zip_code AS cntct_zip_code, fut_tmm03.fax_number, fut_tmm03.country_code AS cntct_country, fut_tmm03.ap_contact, fut_tmm03.e_mail, fut_tmm03.end_user_nbr[$0a$]FROM fut_tmm01[$0a$]LEFT JOIN fut_arm02 ON fut_arm02.firm_id=fut_tmm01.firm_id AND fut_arm02.customer_nbr=fut_tmm01.customer_nbr[$0a$]LEFT JOIN fut_tmm03 ON fut_tmm03.firm_id=fut_tmm01.firm_id AND fut_tmm03.customer_nbr=fut_tmm01.customer_nbr AND fut_tmm03.tm_number=fut_tmm01.tm_number[$0a$]
